Package fr.univnantes.web.websocket

package fr.univnantes.web.websocket
Package containing all classes for the websockets.

This package includes the following packages:

  • fr.univnantes.web.websocket.instruction - Contains all instructions for encapsulate all informations to communicates.
  • WebSocketConfig - The class for the websockets configuration.
  • WebSocketHandler - The class for the websocket handler.
  • WebSocketSessionManager - The class representing the websockets manager.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    fr.univnantes.web.websocket.instruction
    Package containing all instructions that are communicated between the server and clients.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    WebSocketConfig
    Holds the websocket configuration.
    WebSocketHandler
    WebSocketHandler
    WebSocketSessionManager
    This class is used to manage the WebSocket sessions.
